title: Scorpio Awakens
description: Katherine King has everything, her loving and supportive husband, her challenging job and a secure life. An overheard conversation causes the sexual needs that she has buried for years to resurface. Her choice leads to a tsunami of pleasure and passion, to intrigue and to grave danger.“Scorpio Awakens” is a deeply sensual story of enduring love and the lengths she is willing to go to keep it.
author: Lilith Darville
